did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Harold W. Glidden coin collection card index
did.abstract: Card index inventory of Glidden’s collection of coins that were bequeathed to the American Numismatic Society in 1990.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Consists of a card index inventory of Glidden’s collection of coins that were bequeathed to the American Numismatic Society (ANS) in 1990. Cards contain information on period, name of ruler, date, mint, provenance, material, and size. Further information can be found on empty coin sleeves stapled to each card. There are ANS accession numbers on each card corresponding to coins accessioned with the cards in 1991.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: Card index donated by the estate of Harold W. Glidden along with his coin collection in 1990 (1991.3).

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Kept by Harold W. Glidden until his death and then donated to the ANS in 1990.
